body.title: Mapmate
body.description: Mapmate is a full stack application designed to help businesses manage customer locations efficiently. Built with ReactJS, NodeJS, ExpressJS, and MongoDB, Mapmate allows users to visualize client locations on a map, manage customer data, and determine which clients are nearby. The app also provides robust features for adding, editing, and deleting customer information.

background.title: Project Background
background.description: Mapmate was created to provide businesses with a streamlined solution for managing customer locations and data. It offers mapping integration, enabling real-time visualization of customer locations while providing full CRUD operations through a modern and efficient tech stack.

body.title: Inscribe
body.description: Inscribe is more than just an online bookstore—it's a dynamic hub for book lovers. Discover trending reads, explore daily deals, and find out what’s on sale or just arrived. Built with ReactJS, this platform is designed to create a smooth shopping experience, helping users stay updated on the latest literary trends while enjoying exclusive deals.

background.title: Project Background
background.description: Inscribe was created to provide an enjoyable and seamless online shopping experience for book lovers. By implementing a user-friendly interface with ReactJS, the platform brings book trends, deals, and reviews together in one place for an engaging experience.

body.title: TravelTales
body.description: TravelTales is your gateway to unforgettable adventures. This platform makes it easy to book hotels, flights, and curated travel packages while offering a glimpse into what other tourists are saying about your next destination. Built with ReactJS, TravelTales provides a seamless journey from planning to booking to sharing your travel stories.

background.title: Project Background
background.description: TravelTales was designed to bring together booking and travel experience sharing on one platform. Using ReactJS, it delivers a smooth, responsive interface that allows users to book travel and review destinations easily.

body.title: YelpCamp
body.description: This project required me to build a fully responsive website to the designs provided. I used HTML5, along with CSS, JavaScript, VueJs and Firebase.

background.title: Project Background
background.description: This project was a front-end  challenge from Codewell. It’s a platform that enables you to practice building websites to a design and project brief. Each challenge includes mobile and desktop designs to show how the website should look at different screen sizes. Creating these projects has helped me refine my workflow and solve real-world coding problems. I’ve learned how to work with firebase authentication, storage and  firebase firestore

body.description: This project was built in pure HTML and CSS. I had mobile and desktop designs to work to and built it so that it was fully-responsive. I took a mobile-first approach and used modern CSS like Flexbox and Grid for layout purposes.
